text: Kelly's Heroes is a 1970 American war comedy movie directed by Brian G. Hutton. It is about a group of World War II soldiers who go AWOL to rob a bank behind enemy lines. The movie stars Clint Eastwood, Telly Savalas, Don Rickles, Carroll O'Connor, and Donald Sutherland, with secondary roles played by Harry Dean Stanton, Gavin MacLeod and Stuart Margolin. It was released on June 23, 1970 and made $5,200,000 at the movies. It had the budget of $4,000,000. ==References== ==More reading== * * * ==Other websites== * * * Category:1970 comedy-drama movies Category:1970 war movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:American war movies Category:Movies set in the 1940s Category:1970s English-language movies Category:MGM movies Category:American heist movies Category:World War II movies Category:Movies set in France Category:Movies about the United States Armed Forces Category:1970s American drama movies Category:1970s criminal comedy movies Category:1970s crime drama movies Category:American criminal comedy movies Category:American crime drama movies
title: Kelly's Heroes
